sentence: …civil cases, and divorce proceedings, all of       which have profoundly important impact on our community. For       more than 50 years, the Judicial Nomination Commission (JNC)       has successfully allowed DC residents to have a voice in       judicial appointments, while also granting the President and       Senate a role in confirming our judges.…
